reviews.review_text: The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 144% revenue increase in 2 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

I've taken 13 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 29% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 9 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 138% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

The case study breakdowns made all the difference. I learn best by reading and reflecting, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The case study walkthrough helped me finally understand trauma-informed approach.
Loved the practice sessions. Being able to discuss scope of practice with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The form library is something I still reference weekly. Great ongoing value.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 8 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Decent course. The Module 4 module was fantastic, but the final module didn't deliver as much value. Could use more real client examples. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

I've taken 9 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the pricing framework from Module 1. Now charging $295 per session vs $56 before. Game changer.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by academic sources, which builds massive credibility with clients. The outcome assessment has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 25% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 124% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 32 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 90 days using the pitch framework from the assessment section. Already made back 2x my investment.

I've taken 5 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

I've taken 14 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.

As someone with a background in psychology, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and acceptance-commitment approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but the business side could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The theoretical framework section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my professional experience. Now I can confidently explain neurobiology to clients and colleagues.

As someone with a background in business, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and acceptance-commitment approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
